Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel and Excellent Staff!”
Reviews.Author: FaithBGA
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 5 nights touring italy hotel clean comfortable staff friendly helpful especially michael meals ranged excellent fantastic hotel outside city center rome takes approximately 45 minutes city center bus metro night able sleep hotel quiet peaceful

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable Hotel but Remote”
Reviews.Author: gladiola
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights september booked online location appeared short drive outskirts rome wrong literally hotel mixup via actually town wasted 2 hours searching brought gps unless correct information input dont results numerous local people resulted directions called hotel help hotel comfortable bed nice balcony breakfast usual array sweets cold cuts cereal dried toast cappucinos dinner hotel night rave found hotel food simply mediocre sought eateries elsewhere own car fortunately getting rome adventure futility wrong directions 20 minute drive half hours honestly am simply amazed lack knowledge front receptionist people summary michael desk fabrizio direct obviously giving directions drive instinct spent day castel popes summer residence beach secluded lunch local restaurant food delicious hotel stay city centre

Reviews.Title: “Strongly recommend that you DON'T stay here”
Reviews.Author: AP2268
Reviews.Content: booked hotel hot deal hrs distance airport didnt appear location terrible able shuttle advertised site available able secure arrival traveling concierges recommendation shuttle train supposed bus 1030pm told dont run late pay 40 euro taxi addition train fare bus fare basically youre travelling public transport steer hotel shuttle service unreliable booked specific pick night didnt pitch hotel staff accountable completely unapologetic downright defensive rude mistake uncomfortable walking hotel bus station night supposed 600m bus stop advertised hotel bus difficult bus stop information advertised hotel incorrect grubby cobwebs ceiling beds rock hard linen wasnt nice wasnt changed stay breakfast bad worth little stuff stale tasted terrible recommend finding hotel closer grand termini waste 2 hours day travelling hotel allow stay evenings concerned public transport safety operating times
